website_summaries.verdict: This highly rated angle broom offers customers the convenience of a stand-up bin alongside an inexpensive price tag.
pros: Includes a stand-up dust pan for hassle-free cleaning
Broom snaps into dust pan handle for simple storage
A wonderful choice for quickly cleaning dry spills
cons: Product is shorter than some customers appreciated

customer_reviews.title: So short!
customer_reviews.text: This broom is silly short. I'm 5'11 and break my back using it. I'm not sure who this broom is designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Ok sweeper set
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a broom set I had for 10 years from bed bath and beyond. I use it in my kitchen mainly. The dust pan is quite large and the broom is much heftier than I was used to. The clip that allows you to attach the broom to the dust pan is very tight. You really have to muscle the broom away from it to detach it. Hope fully in time it will loosen up. The dust pan seems to make good level contact with the floor to seep dust into it.
customer_reviews.author: J Lock

customer_reviews.title: A good broom set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set to sweep my work room at the end of the day, so I don't have to haul out the vacuum every time. It's a little bigger than I expected, but once I got used to that, I'm pleased with it. It works, the trash goes into the pan and stays there instead of spilling all over the place. The broom does a good job sweeping. And it does remain standing up once I'm done with it without flopping over. Doesn't hurt that it's a pretty blue. So a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: UA

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute broom. But I’m 5,1 and it’s too small for me. So if you are anything above that I wouldn’t recommend getting this broom. It will break your back!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Narea

customer_reviews.title: Almost there not quite....
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the dustpan is very good picks up with no problem the broom is itself is small in width but it also works. My problem with this product it is way way way too short! At least 3-4 inches. Feels awkward to use so I am disappointed and probably would have taken it back if I purchased it locally. The only reason I gave this a three star is because it does satisfy what I was looking for - an attached broom/dustpan that I don't have to keep separate and bend down to use.
customer_reviews.author: leeleebb1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on training your kids how to broom it is a alright product. I knew what I was buying but I was not anticipating it to come damage. I would of return it to get my money back but the box it came with is to big for just one item, and I do not have time to walk to a post office that is miles away from me. (Little tantrum, sorry i am just to lazy).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for disabled
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and and cannot bend over. I use a chair in the kitchen and when I drop something on the floor it is so easy to grab (it is lightweight) and brush up the dirt. No more trying to bend over with a dustpan and brush. I was actually told about this product in a physical rehab. The physical therapist told me how easy it would be on me. Being a senior and living on Social Security the cost was in my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Kathynye

customer_reviews.title: Well it works but I feel like a giant
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so there seems to be some confusion on how tall the broom and dustpan handle are. The broom (including bristles) is about 37 inches. The dustpan handle is about 35 inches. Also, I’m short, just a half inch under 5 feet... I felt like a giant with this thing. It’s certainly better than having to crouch down close to the floor though - cleaning up is easier than before, I had a very hard time because of my terrible ankles. So there’s that. So that’s why I’m only taking one star off. I otherwise like it because it does get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: The broom's stick is small and that is a big issue. The grip is not good for the broom. For the dustpan, the stick length is acceptable but it is definitely not acceptable for the broomstick. I should have listened to the others who reviewed about this. Anyways, I just decided to get a new one with longer stick. Otherwise, the quality of the bristles is good for proper cleaning. It picks up hair and dirt properly.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: A bit short
customer_reviews.text: PROS - Convenient: I love that the pan and broom clip together, and the fact that the dustpan is on its own handle so I don't have to bend over. CONS - Short: I'm 5'7'' and this broom is definitely a bit short. I have to bend over a little when sweeping get a good grip. OVERALL I use this to sweep up in front of my litter boxes and it has been great so far. It's a nice little broom set for anyone who plans on using it for small areas as opposed to a full house cleaning. It is a bit small for cleaning large areas (both short and narrow).
customer_reviews.author: Chloe A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty blue cheers me
customer_reviews.text: I like the broom and dust bin attachment sets and have had several of them over the years. I like to replace them when the broom's strands start to spread or the dust pan gets beat up looking. I like this one's color but for some reason my hand hurts when I am sweeping with the broom. I'm not sure what about this handle is different than others though so I'm not ready to blame the broom--old age on my part, maybe. I just hadn't had this problem before.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: unless you're 5 foot 2 inches tall do not buy this broom it is so short it's nonsensical
customer_reviews.text: This freaking broomhandle was made for people that are 5 feet tall so if you're over like 5 foot 2 in tall don't even bother getting it otherwise it would be awesome they spent time with the dustpan part of it and drops the ball on the length of the broom. I know I spend enough of my day bending over things that should be higher such as stinks and washing machines and patience and taking care of I do not need to do it when I'm sleeping
customer_reviews.author: 1Bad Kitty. In NYC.

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously small/flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, but I still had hoped this would serve my needs. The broom is so ridiculously short that only a child could use this without effort/back pain. Beyond that though, the actual broom itself is very very poorly made, bristles coming apart and falling off right out of the box! The broom is also not only short, but very narrow in width. This might be a great broom for a child to sweep their doll-house one time, but beyond that, BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Keyz

customer_reviews.title: Crazy short
customer_reviews.text: I really, really should've read the reviews and description more closely. My bad. This thing is crazy short. The thing is though, I don't really understand why you'd need a broom so short. It's not comfortable at all to sweep with and I'm only 5'1. Other than that, it seems fairly well-made and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Too small and short
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I am short and still this broom is shorter for me. I don't know how average height folks would use it. The bending causes backache and you most definitely can't sweep the whole floor at one go with this broom. Also the width of the broom is really small , it looked deceptively normal sized in photo. Just near 6". I had to go to home depot and get a normal one. So much for online shopping.
customer_reviews.author: hems

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind- we tried a bunch!
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a bunch of years until it broke. I should've just bought the same one to replace it. Stupidly, I bought 2 other types of long handled dust pans which didn't work half as well until I finally reordered this one. It's the only one that works!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dumb Short
customer_reviews.text: Why the heck would you make a broom and dustpan so short? If it’s for midgets, you should write that in the title. For the people saying it’s obvious that it’s short - NO IT’S NOT! Otherwise the hundreds of people saying it’s short would NOT be saying it’s short because they would have known it ahead of time & not purchased it! Duh. I’m 5’0” and I can’t use the broom. I gave it to my 3, 5 & 8 year olds to use as theirs. You should not have to check the dimensions of a broom before buying it. Put the info in the Main Heading & Title for such an oddly short item.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Versace

customer_reviews.title: Not made for people 5’10+ you will have to bend to sweep
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom and dust pan set. I regret not buying two! My husband and I are no taller than 5’8 and it works perfectly for us. The quality is wonderful! If you are tall you WILL have to bend or buy an extended handle. Other than that I’m very very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this broom For your kid then sure it’s cool, if you want to buy it and get back pains then sure purchase it. However, if you want an actual broom for a grown person that makes sense then this broom is not for you. The broom bristle is super small and the length of the broom is short. I am 5’3” and the broom was still too short for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but the broom is shorter than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like this set, and it's great for the money. However, the broom is really really short! I didn't whip out the tape measure, but eyeballing it, I'd say it's at least a foot shorter than a regular broom. It's not that big a deal for me since I'm only about 5 feet tall, but I wouldn't recommend for anyone who is even slightly taller than average.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I use this broom to clean my shower. It is wonderful to get into those cracks around the doors and in the corners. I mix up some soap and lemon juice, dip the broom into it and wow... gets it clean and no chemicals. I am so happy with it. Now I don't have to get down on my knees. So great. Clean shower in half the time and not worn out.... yeah!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Dustpan👍👍 broom👎👎
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the standing dustpan, I have back problems and can't bend over so I have to get a standing dustpan. Thankfully I have extra broom because the broom that comes with it is absolute crap, it's super tiny and picks up nothing not to mention it's extremely short so to use it message my back up even more ... pretty useless. The standing dustpan however I love, I really can't go without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, seems like a play toy, not a broom.
customer_reviews.text: This broom set is built for a child. I am so upset I missed the return deadline for this. The broom is extremely short and small, so you have to bend over to sweep. My back is killing me. It feels like a toy.
customer_reviews.author: SGG

customer_reviews.title: BAD ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD NEVER BUY THIS PRODUCT AGAIN. FIRST OF ALL IT CAME TO ME ALREADY USED, SRATCHES ON DUST PAN. A FEW WEEKS LATER PLASTIC BEGAN TO BREAK ON EDGES AND THEN THE RUBBER EDGE STARTED TO COME OFF. THIS WAS JUST A WASTE OF MONEY. I SHOULD HAVE RETURNED IT BUT I AM DISABLED AND DO NOT DRIVE. I WILL NEVER BY THIS PRORDUT AGAIN. WHY WAS I SENT A USED PRODUCT?
customer_reviews.author: Quilty9

customer_reviews.title: Handles too short for the "average" size adult
customer_reviews.text: Yes,it is lightweight and serves the purpose of getting debris off the floor especially for orthopedically impaired adults who can bend to the floor. Despite the fact I am only 5 feet 1 inches tall, the handles on the dustpan and broom seem too short and makes the task somewhat uncomfortable. If you are greater than 5 feet in height, I would not recommend this product. It does have a 5 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great. This is the second one Ive gotten.
customer_reviews.text: Really handy. I use it more than I thought I would. Yeah the broom is smallish, but think of it more like the little brush that comes with a regular dust pan. I bought one a year ago, this is my second. This will be for my elderly father with mobility problems. Squatting down to use a regular dust pan is not easy for him.
customer_reviews.author: GretchenF

customer_reviews.title: A broom perfectly sized for a hobbit
customer_reviews.text: I almost always read product reviews. But unfortunately for me, I didn’t for this product. I was a little bit surprised when I opened the small box and saw the broom in its fully assembled state. I thought, well maybe it extends? Sadly no. I will say though, it’s great for getting into the small spaces in my garage that a large push broom can’t get to. So for that reason and that reason alone, I’ll hold onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough.
customer_reviews.text: Broom isn't wide enough or tall enough. The broom is actually shorter then the dustpan. I'm 5'8" and it's hard on my back to bend over so I can't imagine my 6' 2" husband using this comfortably. The broom is very tiny. It wouldn't be good for sweeping a large room. Maybe a bathroom. It'll be good for the cat litter that gets on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Renee Davis

customer_reviews.title: too little
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be okay even with it being kind of short (since I'm only 5'4"), but I don't like it. I would much prefer a taller broom. I like not having to bend down to use the dustpan, but I don't think I'll end up using it much and instead will be replacing it with a taller broom soon.
customer_reviews.author: AE2

customer_reviews.title: Super short
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware this set is ridiculously short. I’m 5’4 and the top of the handle went to my hips. I feel like this product was really meant to be a nice dustpan with a small broom to get everything in. The broom bristles are very short so I can’t see this being used to actually sweep an area. But I will say the rubber on the top of the dustpan is awesome. No leaving a huge line of dust that you normally need a vacuum to pick up. I bought it for $8.99 to only use in my kitchen to pick up small messes. So I’m keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: QtNicolie

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is just perfect for use in my small apartment. I have hardwood floors and I have to use a power wheelchair. I finally have found just the right set, with this broom and dust pan, that does a great job of sweeping up day to day floor dust and or dry spills. It’s sturdy, and the broom is excellent for sweeping up even the smallest of “things” that seem to find their way onto my floors! I am very pleased with my purchase and recommend this little set highly!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Clark

customer_reviews.title: my aunt loved it
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my aunt. she 94 and was greatful that i bought it for her. no more bending over for her. i test the product and found it sturdy and very easy to use. most of all it's light weight makes it easy for my aunt to move around without getting tired i recommended this products
customer_reviews.author: MS WANNABUY

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Capable Long Handled Folding Dustpan and Short Broom Set.
customer_reviews.text: This small broom and dustpan set are an item that should be found in everyone's home! It is such a practical item! Using a broom and dustpan to clean regularly will reduce the amount of time our Botvac will need to vacuum the house! Also, using this, will cut down on the frequency of having to bend down to pick up stuff, ultimately helping to preserve your backs from excessive bending! The broom head, which is electro-magnetically charged, has the ability to pick up dust and hair (those miniature rolling tumbleweeds we see on the floors. The folding dustpan is unique, well-built, and can conveniently be stored almost anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Herbert L. Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Dust pan good:  Broom, not so much !!
customer_reviews.text: Dust pan is wonderful. Broom is very small and the handle is short. My back prevents me from bending, so I bought two of these to avoid bending when sweeping up the floors. The dust pan is great..snaps down, has a wide front, and it has a rubber "lip" that fits to the floor so everything goes in. The broom, however, is more like a "brush," being very small; the broom handle is short so that a two-handed sweep of the floor is not possible. I have kept my old broom, but use the new dust pans. If the broom from this set had a longer handle or even a pull-out extension, it would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Roth

customer_reviews.title: Short handles. Hurts the back.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the height of this. This is a mini broom and pan. I’m 5’2 and have to bend over to use the set. For quick clean ups in a small area it works ok. But to sweep a large area it’s not very ergonomic. Besides the height, the broom and pan itself are of decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Handy little sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This little broom and dust pan is being used in lieu of buying a new rechargeable hand vacuum. We've had one hand vac after another so I thought we would try this. I have to get out the big vacuum for anything on the carpet, but for hard surfaces this really works well!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: great little broom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the basement to keep by the laundry where "bit" of washed kleenex are always coming out of the dryer. It is perfect for a little pickup job. It works great and stores easily due to it's smaller size and fold up tray. However, it is short and it would not be comfortable to sweep the entire house with. But I bought it for the purpose of being secondary and inexpensive and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: VLD13

customer_reviews.title: TINY
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tiny! I gave it to my 9yo for when he sweeps. I’m not going to be hunched over trying to sweep everyday. It’s not flimsy, but I don’t foresee it lasting very long.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: this is a complete piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: don't waste money on this - it is so flimsy that the slightest pressure placed on the shaft to keep the head of the actual dustpan flush to the floor will bend it - we buy from amazon all the time - we've run into maybe 3 absolutely terrible product that are beyond redemption - this is one of them
customer_reviews.author: Anestis

customer_reviews.title: Not very functional
customer_reviews.text: The piece that you scoop the dust into is good enough but the broom itself is tiny!!! Really more for a child. Plus it's super short so you will strain your back having to lean down to use it. I kept it because I'm too lazy to return this one but buyer beware...this is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lethal

customer_reviews.title: serves purpose
customer_reviews.text: This works great for sweeping floors and for packing away when not in use. My complaint is the handle, not sure what the deal is, but it's uncomfortable when I grip the broom to sweep the floor. To the point, that if I had known this prior, I wouldn't have bought.
customer_reviews.author: amazon meyer

customer_reviews.title: Portable, convenient...
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, stores conveniently in tight spaces and very handy for sweeping up quickly. Broom is a little too narrow if you have a significant amount of sweepable floor but it works great for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Handle is actually quite short. Would be good for a child. It actually made my lower back hurt just using it for a short time. I only need it for a small balcony so I will keep it. Seems sturdy but it is not actually the best at getting in grooves and sweeping things out. Would not recommend if you need for a large space due to the oddly short handle.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I love this dust pan.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy yet lightweight this makes sweeping my kitchen a breeze. The dust pan is perfect. The broom is short. I prefer long ones. So I traded out the broom for a full length one and gave my daughter the short broom for her new apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Napolitano II

customer_reviews.title: Great for training and fun
customer_reviews.text: Really good helper for the beginners of tennis training, this is must have, at least for myself. I can practice and train even in the backyard of the house, no picky for special tennis place. With long rope balls, no worry about balls run away and disappeared, saving me tons of time to pick the ball again and again. This rebound baseboard was coming in smaller than I expected, but it is stable enough to hold the ball. I didn't get used to it at first, it took a few days to master the rules to achieve the best results! Overall It is good training helper for single player for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Bowen He

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model (about 3 years old) which I love! I bought two more in May, 2020. They are not even close to the same. The bucket is flimsy and bendable. The bucket doesn't lock into place, at all, so you are left to manage the tilt while sweeping. It remains tilted, so your body is bent into an uncomfy position. They are horrible. Im disappointed. WIll be buying another brand for replacement. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie-girl

customer_reviews.title: Handy dandy quick-sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for small kitchenette area in senior living. Just right for sweeping crumbs between washings of floor. Stores compactly. Included dustpan with long handle very nice, but neither the broom or dustpan are robust enough for "big jobs." Good price for the usefulness it provides.
customer_reviews.author: mjdisler

customer_reviews.title: A luttle short but serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I love the dust pen and use it with my old broom: the size, the fold ability and the clip that fits most of the brooms. The broom part is too short and not soft for my tile floor in the house. I found it useful to sweep in garage. Overall it’s a good set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This broom and dustpan does the job. I like that the handle sticks are actually metal. The broom was smaller than I thought but for the price it’s really good. I like that it clips together and can fold up for storage. This would be excellent for an apartment or smaller home.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Deniz

customer_reviews.title: Makes clean up easier
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these. Great for everday sweep ups. I keep one just for sweeping up cat litter and it makes cleaning up cat litter so much easier!! I like how the dust pan and broom click together and the dust pan folds. So easy to store/very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Momofmultiples

customer_reviews.title: Not for a common household
customer_reviews.text: I lived in a dorm room when I originally ordered this. It's not bad but it's not the best. I did expect it's short height but what I didn't expect was how filmsy it is. Anyone who's parents taught them how to sweep knows that a broom like this is for children playing in their play house. It would not last long back at home during chores but for a college dorm it was sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee W.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a broom that works
customer_reviews.text: This one is inexpensive but it snaps together and gets the job done. We purchased a more expensive one first but the grooves to connect the pieces weren't manufactured to actually grab. Maybe good design but cheap labor. We sent it back. So far this one is just what the doctor ordered.
customer_reviews.author: G. Russell

customer_reviews.title: I like the very large pan and the rubber coated front
customer_reviews.text: I like the very large pan and the rubber coated front, but I was expecting it to be the type that lifts up when it's not pressed to the floor, like they have at restaurants, etc. On this, the pan just snaps in place and stays that way until you snap it back up, which could be helpful for some situations.
customer_reviews.author: Aerochrome120Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Probably Sending Back
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand the benefit in making a broom this size. It’s sturdy enough, but the broom is like a toy. And you can only (semi) comfortably use it with one hand; otherwise, you’ll be bending forward like you’re taking a golf put.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B.

customer_reviews.title: For short people
customer_reviews.text: The handle is too short. If I was about 2 feet shorter it would be perfect. I try to get really short friends to come over to sweep my kitchen. So far no one has volunteered to help me. I even offered them a snack and beer.
customer_reviews.author: Ms M&M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it, saves my back
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people mention the broom is too short to sweep the floor. It is not meant to sweep floors, the short broom is to just sweet dirt into the dust pan. Well, I'm in my 60's and it was painful bending over to hold my dust pan so I ordered this and I love it. It serves my purpose very well and I'm thankful to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Old Texan's

customer_reviews.title: Close but..
customer_reviews.text: I lost my original somewhere along the way and went to replace it with this set. Every bit as good as the first one I had except this one does not stand up when folded up, a feature I really liked with my first one. Otherwise this is great for the garage. Since there were two versions offered on Amazon, I wonder if there other one stands on its own when closed?
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but VERY short
customer_reviews.text: Good price and does the job. But it’s very short and honestly hurts my back Having to bend over to sweep. I would have returned it, but it works fine and my 15 month old loves using it as her broom (seriously that’s how short it is)
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for tall people
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6'5" and the handle of the broom will not work for me. It is for a midget. It's awesome price and it is durable. I just can't bend ovet swiping dirt. Returned it the same day. I recommend for shory people.
customer_reviews.author: Soeum

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have around the house especially the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I am getting less able to do housework as I age. It was exactly what I wanted and needed. Of course, it would have been even better if it came with an android to clean my house, but one can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Lori George Alexander

customer_reviews.title: TALL PEOPLE: Read the dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Good product, been using it regularly for several months now and it works well and the broom still snaps right into place for storage. Only thing is, broom itself is pretty short so if you're on the taller side I'd take this into consideration!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: All in one broom
customer_reviews.text: Good size for a rv trailer. I love the fact that it folds up. Then I tuck it away. I’m 5’2 so I have to bend down a little while sweeping but I’m ok with that. I like it a lot. Exactly what I had been searching for and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ellison

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE, DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME/MONEY, ON THIS PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT, HAS TO BE MADE IN CHINA!! THEY ARE THE ONLY PEOPLE; WHO ARE SMALL ENOUGH; OR MAYBE, ‘BILBO BOBBIT,’ THE HOBBIT; FROM, ‘LORD OF THE RINGS,’ COULD USE THIS THING!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME; BUYING THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: William D. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very short, hurts my back
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyy shorter than expected. I didn’t look at the measurements but nothing else indicated it would be so tiny. It’s about the size for a child, not an average adult (I’m 5’5”). Hurts my back to use, which was disappointing..
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very short height.
customer_reviews.text: This was more like a toy you'd buy for a child, not good for my 6'6" son who sweeps for me. Reminds me of when he was a toddler playing, only with a greater height disparity. It is helpful having a dust pan that stands on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: It's a dust pan
customer_reviews.text: It's a little short for me as a 6' tall person. I have to hunch an uncomfortable amount to use it on the floor but overall it has a great sweep, leaves the floor clean and the dust pan is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Broom is SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Guess I should have read the description better. The broom and dustpan are sturdy. The dustpan handle is a good height. But the broom is really small. Perfect size for my 6 year old but not really great for an adult. 🤦🏼‍♀️ Would have been 5 stars with a full size broom
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t pick up trash well
customer_reviews.text: The broom brush head comes in smaller than I thought, and the bristle are quite hard and doesn’t pick up trash well, I feel like I need to take twice as effort to clean one small area, pretty frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy especially from this SELLER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unless your 46inches like my daughter do not waste your money!!! I paid 20 dollars for a real broom and this is more of a child's toy not only that but the seller will NOT let you return it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: Not user-friendly! Bad broom!
customer_reviews.text: This is really awkward to use; I would not buy it. Hard to empty the dustpan b/c it only turns towards one side and the broom is a more suitable height for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Durable, not flimsy at all. Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Who knew you could have a favorite broom?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a toy for my toddler grandson who likes to “sweep” sometimes. A toy broom would have cost more than this, which turned to be a great tool. Compact, easy to keep handy, the broom clips on the dustpan which folds up to be truly freestanding - no leaning it some where. The dust pan can free-stand in use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Veda M. Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: No More Bending or Kneeling
customer_reviews.text: Tired of bending down with a dustpan after sweeping? Then be sure to purchase this broom/dustpan combo. The broom's handle may be a little shorter than that of standard brooms, but its accompanying dustpan has an elongated handle so you can sweep AND collect floor dirt totally standing up. Sweeping has never been easier or more convenient. Thanks to this handy product, I no longer dread this chore!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible dustpan, the worst I've ever had. It doesn't pick up the dirt properly, and all that happens is that it just been pushed underneath the dustpan more and more. It took me five minutes to get it all onto the dustpan. It's just not worth the efforts. I've getting rid of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Gili abro

customer_reviews.title: Back-saver Great for busy people
customer_reviews.text: This is the best spur-of-the -moment purchase for anyone who hates lugging out a vacuum cleaner or bending over with the smaller dust pan. The flip-lock works beautifully for out-of-the-way storage and the rubber edge hugs the floor. For quick clean-ups and easy on the back, I recommend it. It's fairly sturdy and perfect for busy people who just want a quick touch-up after the kids run through the house. It's a back saver.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Conroe Happy

customer_reviews.title: This dust pan is pretty terrible. The rubber edge sits about 1/8" off ...
customer_reviews.text: This dust pan is pretty terrible. The rubber edge sits about 1/8" off the floor and allows dust to slide under it. If you tilt the pan too forcefully to creat the proper seal the handle collapses. It is poorly engineered. You have to be too delicate to make this product work, not something you want in a dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Pettijohn

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job, but a little short
customer_reviews.text: It was quite a bit smaller than I had expected, I’m pretty avg height and its hard for me to use it comfortably. (I’m 5’8”) but really and truly that’s my fault for not reading more info before I purchased. It does it’s job though
customer_reviews.author: Paxton Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Not made for the avg joe or jane
customer_reviews.text: I usually dont write reviews but ill make an exception since this is literally the worst broom ever. Must be made for children bc no matter how i try to position myself, it’s uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.author: IntraTech

customer_reviews.title: so short
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't pay attention to the height of this broom...that was my mistake as it's clearly pictured but I am very short, 5 ft and this broom is too short for even me! Need to by a new broom because it hurts my back to use and takes forever to clean a room. Durable though, I'm sure this is what some people are looking for but it wasn't what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 oF these and really pleased with these purchase. They are sturdy and the rubber lining at the bottom is great and collects all the dirt. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Guam Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better if the broom head is wider
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice broom and dustpan. What I love the most is the handle of the dustpan. Really convenient to use. But the broom head is a little bit narrow. Would be better if the broom head is wider so I can sweep a larger area at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Z.Z

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but definitely on the short side.
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Very compact, but really only useful to pick up a small mess. The broom handle is VERY short, so it is not very comfortable to sweep more than a small area of my kitchen at a time. Stores well though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamna

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another one that I stepped on and broke. This one is much sturdier than my previous one. I use this almost every day and it is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non functional
customer_reviews.text: Worst product, do not buy! Not useful, very misleading description. It is very non functional, hard to use broom. Beware that it is sponsored ? Perhaps paid to show up on top? Do NOT BUY! Even a broom bought at a Dollar store will be more useful than this
customer_reviews.author: anu

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted, light weight and light duty, I like the softer rubber edge that conforms to the floor for better ability to sweep the floor junk into the pan.
customer_reviews.author: MCOHRS

customer_reviews.title: Works but the broom  is a tad short
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and not heavy but broom is only about 4 ft high. I know it's my fault for not checking the dimensions prior to ordering but I prefer a longer broom.
customer_reviews.author: Dumpling

customer_reviews.title: Too short, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement photo shows the broom as the size of the dustpan. Its excessively short and not ergonomical for someone of average height. Built sturdy but i still cant use it without having to bend over way too much to be comfortable. For someone who sweeps multiple times a day, its not a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a super tall person so the height doesn't bother me at all. I do feel the broom is little heavy for me. However, since the whole set is only around $10, I still view it as a great deal due to the pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Malexxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set I have ever owned. The broom bristles are nice and stiff, the broom and dust pan are extremely light weight and it is perfect for my small space closet! Perfect!! Will buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I wanted at all! I wanted a regular broom with a dustpan! This is half the height and size of regular broom! Not meant for sweeping the floor! So annoyed! Now I have to order a different one and wait for another broom!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: built for short people and storage
customer_reviews.text: The broom is tough to use to sweep as it's short. When you are sweeping into the pan the handle heights make sense but to get debris into a pile the broom is tough. We use a full size broom and the pan. The clip holds the non-matching broom just fine.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and really uncomfortable to handle
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time and my wrists hurt so bad! Just attempted to sweep things off the carpet! Heavy and so uncomfortable to handle. The brush is designed weirdly, it really takes a lot to be able to sweep somehow. I don't like it at all. I need to get another product asap to replace this.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA B.

customer_reviews.title: Simple BUT Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law had one of these and I thought it was so terrific that I ordered one for myself. Now I can't live without it. Recently my daughter in law moved and in the craziness of the move, this got left behind. She was so upset that she didn't have it that I surprised her with one. Obviously we both have vacuums etc. but this Quickie Stand is one of the simplest but WONDERFUL cleaning items. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Too short!!!
customer_reviews.text: What the heck is this crap!!? A broom for midgets !!! I gotta walk around like a humpback just to sweep my floor. Oh well. Time to put my three year old to work lol
customer_reviews.author: TellItHowItis

customer_reviews.title: Broom is too short, dustpan is poorly designed overall.
customer_reviews.text: Both the broom and dustpan are poorly designed. The broom is too short and forces you to hunch over. Since the handle of the dustpan folds forward, ostensibly to collapse for more convenient storage, you can't push down on the handle to really force the lip of the pan to sit flush with the floor. The "feature" of collapsibility actually makes the whole dustpan feel flimsy; without it, I might keep the dustpan and buy a better broom. I did like that the dustpan was rather large, so I will probably use this to sweep up leaves outside or something.
customer_reviews.author: Jenessa Wu

customer_reviews.title: Tiny broom
customer_reviews.text: Probably should have paid more attention to the size. The broom is super small. It looks like a child’s broom. The dustpan seems decent and well made. I will need to purchase a broom still
customer_reviews.author: JaeMc21

customer_reviews.title: Quickie has Great Quality!  Don't buy cheaper ones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought cheaper versions of it, but we had a problem the Quickie was the one we grabbed forsaking all others. I finally decided to get another Quickie because I was tired of hunting my Quickie like it was a bear in our forest. This is a great broom and dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: The dust pan part isn’t all the way flat at the bottom so stuff slides underneath. Otherwise it’s sturdy and good quality and nice and small for a small area
customer_reviews.author: Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Dustpan is very large
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small broom and dustbin to store in a small closet. This broom is fine, but the dustpan is disproportionately large. Too large to fit where I wanted to use it. I would send it back but it came in a huge coffin size box that I can't imagine fitting into my car to drop at a UPS drop off.
customer_reviews.author: mother of boys

customer_reviews.title: Can't get better than this
customer_reviews.text: I've seen very expensive one and this does the job that I need, it's for home use not work so it is more than enough, I'm getting more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chesti

product_meta.title: Quickie Stand and Store Stand & Store Long Handle, Upright Broom and Dustpan Set for Use in Home, Kitchen, Office, Lobby, and Outdoors, 1-Pack
product_meta.description: Style Name:with StandThe Quickie Stand and Store Lobby Broom and Dustpan is an essential set to have in your home. It helps to make clean up fast and easy. This Quickie stand with store lobby broom and dustpan holds all types of debris, wet or dry. Its patented, flip-locking system helps you to sweep up messes and flip the collector in an upright position, so it does not spill out. It's made with the finest broom fibers for catching all types of surface particles, both large and small. This Stand and Store lobby broom and dustpan set snaps together for easy, compact storage. The built-in feet help you to store the product in an upright position without taking up added space. Use this Quickie stand with store lobby broom and dustpan both indoors and outdoors. Keep one in the office closet at your work space to keep everything looking tidy and clean, as well.
feature_bullets: ALL-PURPOSE: This lobby broom and dustpan both indoors and outdoors as it is made to hold both wet and dry debris. Keep one in your kitchen, garage, or work space to keep everything looking tidy and clean
CONTROL YOUR DEBRIS: Our patented, flip-locking system helps you to sweep up messes and flip the collector in an upright position, preventing spills
MATERIAL: This wisp angle broom is made with the finest broom fibers for catching both large and small debris on all types of surfaces, as well as a steel handle for durability
COMFORTABLE USE: The long handles and lightweight design make this very comfortable to use and carry. This standing dustpan means no more bending over to catch every crumb!
STORAGE: The broom nests in the dustpan, which sits on its built-in feet for stability, providing easy storage without taking up added space. It also has a convenient hang-up feature
DUSTPAN: The large-capacity dust pan features a floor-molding lip that helps you sweep up any debris with ease, and ensures you catch it all
SIZE: This broom and dust pan as a set has a long handle measuring 35.5-inches, and a wide-mouthed 10-inch dustpan. In total this set weighs 2 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars3,491 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
